name: Web Development
description: Projects focused on building responsive and dynamic websites using modern web technologies such as Angular, React, and Node.js.

name: Mobile Applications
description: Cross-platform mobile app development for Android and iOS using Flutter, React Native, or native technologies.

name: UI/UX Design
description: Creative and user-centered design solutions with focus on intuitive interfaces and seamless experiences.

name: Machine Learning
description: AI-driven projects using Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn to create predictive models and intelligent systems.

name: Backend Development
description: APIs, authentication systems, and server-side logic built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

name: Cloud & DevOps
description: Deployment, monitoring, and automation solutions using AWS, Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and Kubernetes.

name: Data Visualization
description: Interactive dashboards and analytics tools built with D3.js, Chart.js, and Python visualization libraries.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Security audits, penetration testing, and secure application architecture for client projects.
